title: Genome assembly using PacBio data
questions: How to perform a genome assembly with PacBio data ?
objectives: Assemble a Genome with PacBio data
key_points: PacBio data allows to perform good quality genome assembly
Quast and BUSCO make it easy to compare the quality of assemblies

contributors.name: Gallantries: Bridging Training Communities in Life Science, Environment and Health
contributors.funding_statement: This project (2020-1-NL01-KA203-064717) is funded with the support of the Erasmus+ programme of the European Union. Their funding has supported a large number of tutorials within the GTN across a wide array of topics.

workflows.name: Genome Assembly using PacBio data
workflows.title: Genome Assembly using PacBio data
workflows.description: Genome Assembly using PacBio data and Flye assembler

history.message: flye-assembly workflow modified with new tools versions

admin_install_yaml:
---
install_tool_dependencies: true
install_repository_dependencies: true
install_resolver_dependencies: true
tools:
